desc.en: 輕鬆玩撲克牌的優香和老師。優香打牌時很認真計算機率，奇怪的是不管怎麼玩就是輸。遊戲結束後，優香在整理桌面時發現老師對牌動了手腳，因此大發雷霆。
desc.jp: 輕鬆玩撲克牌的優香和老師。優香打牌時很認真計算機率，奇怪的是不管怎麼玩就是輸。遊戲結束後，優香在整理桌面時發現老師對牌動了手腳，因此大發雷霆。
desc.zh_cn: 轻松玩扑克牌的优香和老师。优香打牌时很认真计算机率，奇怪的是不管怎么玩就是输。游戏结束后，优香在整理桌面时发现老师对牌动了手脚，因此大发雷霆。

desc.en: 優香想把夏萊休息室裡放著的一套桌遊拿走，老師欣然同意，同時對優香居然玩遊戲感到些許驚訝。
desc.jp: 優香想把夏萊休息室裡放著的一套桌遊拿走，老師欣然同意，同時對優香居然玩遊戲感到些許驚訝。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香想把夏莱休息室里放着的一套桌游拿走，老师欣然同意，同时对优香居然玩游戏感到些许惊讶。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香想把夏莱休息室里放着的一套桌游拿走，老师欣然同意，同时对优香居然玩游戏感到些许惊讶。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香想把沙勒休息室里放着的一套桌游拿走，老师欣然同意，同时对优香居然玩游戏感到些许惊讶。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: 老師和優香在間隔時間玩撲克。優香先給老師打了預防針，表示撲克本質上就是賭博，賭博就是概率問題，而她很擅長計算概率。
desc.jp: 老師和優香在間隔時間玩撲克。優香先給老師打了預防針，表示撲克本質上就是賭博，賭博就是概率問題，而她很擅長計算概率。
desc.zh_cn: 老师和优香在间隔时间玩扑克。优香先给老师打了预防针，表示扑克本质上就是赌博，赌博就是概率问题，而她很擅长计算概率。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: 三局下來，不論優香怎麼判斷老師的撲克牌組合概率有多麼低，老師次次都能壓制優香。

desc.en: 優香最後不得不承認在撲克牌中計算概率用處不大，老師告訴優香更多的靠直覺就好。然而就在收拾棋牌的時候，優香突然注意到這副撲克中牌似乎出現了兩副牌。
desc.jp: 優香最後不得不承認在撲克牌中計算概率用處不大，老師告訴優香更多的靠直覺就好。然而就在收拾棋牌的時候，優香突然注意到這副撲克中牌似乎出現了兩副牌。
desc.zh_cn: 优香最后不得不承认在扑克牌中计算概率用处不大，老师告诉优香更多的靠直觉就好。然而就在收拾棋牌的时候，优香突然注意到这副扑克中牌似乎出现了两副牌。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Sensei and the task force manage to rescue Serika from the Helmet Gang. Ayane finds signs of contraband among the tank's wreckage. Meanwhile, the Kaiser PMC that controlled the Helmet Gang decides to enlist the help of Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 顺利从头盔团手中救出芹香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 顺利从头盔团手中救出茜香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 顺利从头盔团手中救出芹香的老师和对策委员会学生们。战斗后，绫音从头盔团所使用的战车残骸中，发现奇普托斯外部势力的痕迹。另一方面，在背后控制头盔团的凯萨PMC的理事，由于对于接二连三的失败大失所望，于是便雇用新的便利屋职员来取代头盔团。

desc.en: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.jp: Though Serika is rescued, she still falls apart after getting a shot of the anti-air missile. Shiroko brings Serika to the infirmary. Ayane finds out that the Helmet Gang seem to be using illegal weapons in Kivotos, suggesting that there might be a mastermind in the dark.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。白子将芹香送到了医护室。绫音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 虽然救出了茜香，但吃了一发防空导弹的茜香还是支棱不住。白子将茜香送到了医护室。绫音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 虽然救出了芹香，但吃了一发防空导弹的芹香还是支棱不住。白子将芹香送到了医护室。绫音发现头盔团似乎使用了基沃托斯境内违法使用的武器，认为其背后有更大的幕后黑手。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

hobby.jp: 家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Sensei visits Serika. Though still doesn't trust Sensei, she thanks Sensei and leaves in a hurry.
desc.jp: Sensei visits Serika. Though still doesn't trust Sensei, she thanks Sensei and leaves in a hurry.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师前去看望芹香。虽然还是对老师不信任，芹香还是跟老师道了谢，而后匆匆离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师前去看望茜香。虽然还是对老师不信任，茜香还是跟老师道了谢，而后匆匆离开。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.jp: Hifumi agrees to guide The Foreclosure Task Force around the market in return for helping her earlier. Meanwhile, the boss of Problem Solver 68, Aru, struggles to get a loan so she can pay off her earlier mistake.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会一行人要求日富美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日富美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长阿露，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对策委员会一行人要求日步美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日步美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长亚瑠，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对策委员会一行人要求日富美介绍黑市，以作为让她从小流氓手中脱险的代价。因此一行人便与日富美同行一段时间。另一方面，便利屋68的社长爱露，为了挽回之前的败仗而寻找借用资金的方法。

desc.en: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.
desc.jp: As Hifumi is more familiar with the Market, everyone asks her to lead the way for them.

desc.jp: The failed mission carried out by Problem Solver 68 shocks the PMC, who insists that the data must be wrong. Yet Black Suit thinks the data is nothing wrong and decides to investigate the reason.
desc.zh_cn: 便利屋68任务失败，让PMC方面大为震惊，认为绝对是数据出了问题。黑服认为数据绝对无误，决定去调查具体原因。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Having failed the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decides to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seems to have her own way.
desc.jp: Having failed the mission, as well as running out of money, the Problem Solver decides to turn to loan. Though Aru's account was suspended due to the wanted warrant issued by the Prefect Team, she seems to have her own way.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 任务失利加上资金耗尽，便利屋于是决定前去贷款。虽然阿露的账号已经因被风纪委员会通缉而被冻结，但阿露显然有自己的路子
desc.zh_cn_tw: 任务失利加上资金耗尽，便利屋于是决定前去贷款。虽然亚瑠的账号已经因被风纪委员会通缉而被冻结，但亚瑠显然有自己的路子
desc.zh_cn_cn: 任务失利加上资金耗尽，便利屋于是决定前去贷款。虽然爱露的账号已经因被风纪委员会通缉而被冻结，但爱露显然有自己的路子

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.jp: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.zh_cn: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.jp: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 走了几小时的对策委员会与日富美筋疲力尽，野宫因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 走了几小时的对策委员会与日步美筋疲力尽，野乃美因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。

desc.en: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.jp: Everyone discovers that their debt payment seems to be funneling directly into the bank. And in order to prove this, Shiroko brings up her plan of robbing a bank again, hoping to find the documents in the process. Hifumi is then "willingly" to be involved in this.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人发现自己的钱财似乎流入了黑市银行，而为了证实这一点，白子再次提起了自己抢银行的计划，希望藉由找到证明文件。众人顺便把日富美卷入其中。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.jp: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.zh_cn: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.jp: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.zh_cn: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。

desc.en: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.jp: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 中间有人提出了回到歌赫娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳世子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳代子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有风纪委员会，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，爱露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的爱露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么阿露不先收钱办事，阿露则说是怕被客户干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遥香则布置好了炸弹。无月不解为什么亚瑠不先收钱办事，亚瑠则说是怕被客户干涉太多。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，春香则布置好了炸弹。睦月不解为什么爱露不先收钱办事，爱露则说是怕被客户干涉太多。

desc.en: Sensei meets Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino leaves in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talks about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.jp: Sensei meets Nonomi and Hoshino at the Committee room. Hoshino leaves in advance due to her own business. Nonomi then talks about former Hoshino and her senior.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师在对策委员会的教室遇见了野宫与星野。星夜有事先行离开了。野宫随后跟老师提起了以前的星野以及她的前辈。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师在对策委员会的教室遇见了野乃美与星野。星夜有事先行离开了。野乃美随后跟老师提起了以前的星野以及她的前辈。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Hoshino leaves school and has a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit repurposes the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to decline".
desc.jp: Hoshino leaves school and has a meeting with the Black Suit. Black Suit repurposes the so-called "proposal", claiming to give her "a condition that she'll never be able to decline".
desc.zh_cn: 星野离开了学校，去见了黑服。黑服重新提起了所谓提案，并声称会给她一个“无法拒绝的条件”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_cn: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_cn: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师突然将视线与春香的对上了。春香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有沙勒的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sensei expresses their opinions on Problem Solver 68, thinking that they aren't intentional. Most of the Foreclosure Task Force agree, but says it is still impossible to transfer for the identity of their backgrounds remained unknown.
desc.jp: Sensei expresses their opinions on Problem Solver 68, thinking that they aren't intentional. Most of the Foreclosure Task Force agree, but says it is still impossible to transfer for the identity of their backgrounds remained unknown.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师表示了自己对便利屋的看法，认为他们不是故意的。对策委员会的大多数也同意，但表示因为还没找到幕后黑手，所以不能轻易交给歌赫娜。

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.jp: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳世子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到春香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是沙勒，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被歌赫娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在歌赫娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心沙勒这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。

desc.en: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.jp: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 佳代子希望阿露尽快离开，但阿露不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 佳世子希望亚瑠尽快离开，但亚瑠不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 佳代子希望爱露尽快离开，但爱露不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。

desc.en: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。

desc.en: Ako tries to explain that she is fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter has been long gone. Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.
desc.jp: Ako tries to explain that she is fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter has been long gone. Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.
desc.zh_cn: 亚子试图解释自己是在和便利屋68作战，但转眼间后者便消失不见。阳奈的脸越来越黑，不过随后表示理解，但仍然指出此类政治问题应交由万魔殿进行处理。阳奈表示将处以亚子紧闭处分。

desc.en: Hina says the conflict is indeed their wrong doings, but it's also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remain hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentions "that incident" and suddenly realizes something.
desc.jp: Hina says the conflict is indeed their wrong doings, but it's also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remain hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentions "that incident" and suddenly realizes something.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了歌赫娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈宣布风纪委员会全部撤离，并向对策委员会请求原谅，表示今后不再会擅自入侵。歌赫娜的队伍迅速离去。

desc.en: Being late on site, Hoshino is confused about what happened. Everyone decides to discuss it tomorrow in classroom and returns early. Shiroko notices that Hina seems to have said something to Sensei, and Sensei says that they will know it by tomorrow.
desc.jp: Being late on site, Hoshino is confused about what happened. Everyone decides to discuss it tomorrow in classroom and returns early. Shiroko notices that Hina seems to have said something to Sensei, and Sensei says that they will know it by tomorrow.
desc.zh_cn: 迟到的星野对事情懵懵懂懂，不知究竟发生了什么事。大家决定明天在教室再讨论，所有人都提早回去了。白子注意到，阳奈在走之前似乎跟老师说了些什么。老师表示之后会跟大家说的。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.jp: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，绫音和芹香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，绫音和茜香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师为前往阿拜多斯的便利屋送行。另一方面，绫音和芹香一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。

desc.en: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.jp: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与风纪委员会的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。阿露表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示阿露真是令人操心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与风纪委员会的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。亚瑠表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示亚瑠真是令人操心。

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.
desc.jp: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。阿露表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。亚瑠表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。爱露表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回阿拜多斯看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着便利屋68东西的卡车随后消失在路口。

desc.en: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.jp: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绫音和芹香前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，阿拜多斯土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。

desc.en: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: 对策委员会从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.jp: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.
desc.zh_cn: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和绫音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。

昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.jp: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.zh_cn: 星野阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但星野表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白字表示星野没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。

desc.en: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.
desc.jp: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。芹香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。茜香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。

desc.en: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.
desc.jp: With current clues on hand, Ayane finally confirms that Kaiser's goal is exactly the land of Abydos. The exact reason remains unknown. Sensei tells everyone the things he heard from Hina, and everyone decides to go to the desert immediately.
desc.zh_cn: 绫音通过已有的线索，最终认定凯撒集团盯上的正是阿拜多斯的土地，但对具体原因仍并不特别清楚。老师向各位讲出了从阳奈那听来的事情，众人立刻决定前往沙漠。

desc.en: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.jp: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.
desc.zh_cn: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，对策委员会小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.zh_cn: 凯萨的干部出现在对策委员会面前，自称自己就是阿拜多斯的债权人。

desc.en: The PMC is too strong for everyone to escape. The director of PMC suddenly visits at this time, and Hoshino recognizes him and remembers something.
desc.jp: The PMC is too strong for everyone to escape. The director of PMC suddenly visits at this time, and Hoshino recognizes him and remembers something.
desc.zh_cn: PMC包围圈过于强大，众人无法脱逃。这时PMC理事突然到访，星野认出了他，记起了一些事情。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_cn: 星野记起，在之前的那次见面中，黑服在自己和PMC理事前向自己提出了那个“请求”，并要自己做出选择。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: The PMC director proposes to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognizes him, and the latter says hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaks his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he says he wants to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.
desc.jp: The PMC director proposes to add the losses caused by everyone to the amount owed. Hoshino recognizes him, and the latter says hello to Hoshino. Then he "accidentally" leaks his hiring of the Problem Solver 68 and the Helmet Group. Afterwards, he says he wants to have a good talk with Abydos about the debt.
desc.zh_cn: PMC理事提出要将众人造成的损失一并加入欠款金额中。星野认出了他，后者像星野问好，并“无意间”说出了自己雇佣便利屋和头盔团的事情。之后，他表示想和阿拜多斯好好谈论一下债务。

desc.en: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.jp: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.zh_cn: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫对策委员会。星野带着气愤的对策委员会一行人暂时撤退。

desc.en: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asks Hina whether she knew about Hoshino. Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.jp: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asks Hina whether she knew about Hoshino. Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被歌赫娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在沙勒等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Despite all of this, Hina still can't figure out that, why would Hoshino choose to not leave even after "that incident".
desc.jp: Despite all of this, Hina still can't figure out that, why would Hoshino choose to not leave even after "that incident".
desc.zh_cn: 尽管如此，阳奈还是想不明白，为什么星野在经历了“那件事”后，仍未离开阿拜多斯。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Kaiser Director introduces himself to everyone, which is immediately got under fire. But the director doesn't care, and says that given the current situation, it is true that the Foreclosure Task Force has invaded their own private lands. He also says that the troops are all for searching treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. Nobody is convinced, and director demonstrates just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".
desc.jp: Kaiser Director introduces himself to everyone, which is immediately got under fire. But the director doesn't care, and says that given the current situation, it is true that the Foreclosure Task Force has invaded their own private lands. He also says that the troops are all for searching treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. Nobody is convinced, and director demonstrates just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，对策委员会一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。

desc.en: Kaiser Director makes a call and says that Abydos High School's credit is at all-time low, and the interest rate will be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.
desc.jp: Kaiser Director makes a call and says that Abydos High School's credit is at all-time low, and the interest rate will be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示阿拜多斯学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的绫音收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。星野表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.jp: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.zh_cn: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.jp: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.zh_cn: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.jp: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.
desc.jp: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.
desc.zh_cn: 众人还是不理解PMC究竟在找什么，毕竟石油之类的高价值物品已被探明并不存在。白子想先去调查一下，但被绫音识出可能实为去抢银行，遭到阻止。星野让大家冷静下来，先行回去休息。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.
desc.jp: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.
desc.zh_cn: 白子和老师等到很晚才离开。星野因疲劳打发走了白子，但老师并未离开。老师拿出了星野的退社信，星野想把问题转移到白子上，但老师紧追不放。星野同意向老师讲述情况，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".
desc.jp: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".
desc.zh_cn: 因为风沙太大，积尘严重，星野咳了几声，表示学校人手实在不够。星野之后又嘀咕了几句。老师说星野看上去非常喜欢阿拜多斯，后者则表示了否定。之后，星野向老师讲出了那个“请求”。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: It turns out that deal is, if Hoshino's willing to join in PMC (to become a mercenary), then the Black Suit will be willing to take on half of the school's debt.
desc.jp: It turns out that deal is, if Hoshino's willing to join in PMC (to become a mercenary), then the Black Suit will be willing to take on half of the school's debt.
desc.zh_cn: 原来那个请求便是，如果星野加入PMC（成为佣兵），那么黑服将愿意承担他们学校一半的债务。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.
desc.jp: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.
desc.zh_cn: 星野推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，星野表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。星野还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。星野走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Ayane is the first to arrive at the club room. She finds no one here except for a shocking news.
desc.jp: Ayane is the first to arrive at the club room. She finds no one here except for a shocking news.
desc.zh_cn: 绫音第一个来到对策委员会的活动室，发现没有人在。随后，绫音发现了一个惊天动人的消息。

hobby.jp: 家計簿をつけること、骨董品収集

desc.en: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.jp: In her letter, Hoshino reveals that she joined Kaiser PMC in exchange for Abydos High School's debt being forgiven. Now, without Hoshino, the remaining members of the Foreclosure Task Force scramble when PMC forces close in on Abydos High School.
desc.zh_cn: 星野在信上写说，为了免除阿拜多斯高中的债务，自己已经去当凯萨PMC的佣兵。在其余对策委员会一行人深感混乱之际，PMC兵力为了占领星野消失踪影的阿拜多斯高中而来犯。

desc.en: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.jp: Hoshino left an resignation application and a letter. In the letter, Hoshino confesses the fact that she is going to be a mercenary at PMC, and says that "(the Black Suit) will take on half of Abydos' debt".
desc.zh_cn: 星野留下了退社书和一封信。在信中，星野向所有人坦白了去PMC做佣兵的事情，并说出了“（黑服）将会承担一半阿拜多斯债务”的事情。

desc.en: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.jp: Hoshino signs at PMC office. Black Suit says that in this way, Hoshino will be transferring all her rights to him (in other words, Hoshino just sold herself), and promises the debt will be taken care as promised.
desc.zh_cn: 星野在PMC办公室签了名。黑服表示，这样的话，星野就将自己所有的权利转移给了他（相当于卖了自己），并承诺债款将会如约承担。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.jp: Hoshino says that this is an responsibility that she should take, and hopes that in this way the Foreclosure Task Force would be less stressed. The letter ends here.
desc.zh_cn: 星野表示这是自己应该背负的责任，希望能够减轻对策委员会的压力。信在此终止。

desc.en: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.jp: In another letter, Hoshino confesses that she does, neither like, nor believe adults. When Shiroko carried Sensei and arrived there, she was even disgusted; but eventually she trusted Sensei. She entrusted Shiroko to Sensei, hoping that Sensei could teach her well and don't let her make mistakes.
desc.zh_cn: 星野在另一封信中坦白，自己并不喜欢大人，也不相信大人。在白子第一次将老师背来时，她甚至有点嫌弃，但最终她信任了老师。她还将白子托付给了老师，希望老师能教导管好白子，不要让她犯错。

desc.en: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino gets on PMC's car, in which it would transport her to Abydos Desert.
desc.zh_cn: 星野登上了PMC的车，那里的车将会把星野运到阿拜多斯沙漠。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

name.en: An Expectation of The Foreclosure Task Force
name.jp: An Expectation of The Foreclosure Task Force

desc.en: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.jp: Hoshino hoped that everyone could protect Abydos well. She added that, if ever, ever that they would meet her on the battlegrounds, she wanted them to destroy her halo.
desc.zh_cn: 星野希望大家能保护好阿拜多斯，并且，如果今后在战场上遇到她的话，能将她的光环破坏掉。

desc.en: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.jp: Finishing reading, everyone is angry at Hoshino's irresponsibility. At this moment, they hears explosions coming outside.
desc.zh_cn: 读罢，众人对星野的“不负责任”非常生气。就在这时，他们听到外面传来爆炸声。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.jp: PMC lead troops to disperse the citizens in Abydos, claiming that an order to leave immediately had been issued. As Hoshino, the former president of the former student union dropped out (i.e. being sold), the student union will not exist anymore, and as a result, the school will not, too.
desc.zh_cn: PMC带领部队前来驱散阿拜多斯地区的民众，宣称此处地方已经下达离开命令。由于作为前学生会成员的星野“退学”（被卖去凯撒），因而阿拜多斯学生会已名存实亡，阿拜多斯已不存在。

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn: 本页列出所有的主线故事的篇号及标题。

desc.en: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: After joining up with Kaiser PMC, Hoshino defects when she learns that Abydos High School is under attack, but is then arrested by Black Suit. When all hope seems lost, Problem Solver 68 returns to Abydos to lend their aid to the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn: 抵达凯萨PMC的星野，听到阿拜多斯高中正遭受攻击的消息后表示抗议，但却反而被黑色西装人拘禁。在千钧一发之际，先前离开的便利屋68一行人出现在阿拜多斯，帮了对策委员会一把。

desc.en: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.jp: Kaiser Director arrives and everyone is immediately triggered. Though claiming that they would be reported to the General Student Council, the director says it is useless and the time just proves that no one could be helping them. The director even points out that, due to Hoshino's dropout, Abydos High School is no longer existed. Everyone is shocked, but still argues with the existence of "The Foreclosure Task Force" - however, according to Ayane, since it is established after the dissolution of the Student Union, the Task Force is in fact a club that hasn't recognized officially. As a result, neither can it represent the school, nor can it be proved to be existed.
desc.zh_cn: 凯撒理事闻声走来，众人对凯撒PMC的无理侵犯表示愤怒，但理事并没有被吓倒。虽然扬言要报告联邦学生会，但理事表示联邦学生会并没有用，而且这么长时间以来的事情也证明了没人来帮助他们。理事直接指出，由于学生会成员星野退学，阿拜多斯已不复存在，众人大惊。众人以“对策委员会”尚存抗争，但绫音表示，由于学生会当时已不存在，所以它并非官方认证的社团，因而实际上无法代表学校，也无法被证明存在。

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.jp: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.
desc.zh_cn: 是PMC公司及其各个子公司的CEO，蔚蓝档案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇与最终章中均有出现，主要目标是将基沃托斯纳入自己的手下统治；曾与黑色西服人合作过。

desc.en: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.jp: Hoshino is in great shock upon hearing PMC were attacking Abydos. The Black Suit explains that, after her dropout, Abydos will no longer have a student belonging to the Student Union, and therefore the school will not exist. The Black suit expresses his interest on establishing a new school purposed by PMC, but then clarifies that their goal is actually Hoshino herself. The fact of cooperating with Kaiser is simply because the interests aren't in conflict. The Black Suit says, as the highest "Mythic" in Kivotos, he will be carrying out experiments on her.
desc.zh_cn: 星野听到PMC攻击阿拜多斯时震惊无比。黑服向星野解释，因为她自己退学，阿拜多斯就没有了学生会成员（即没有了学生会），由此学校已经不复存在。黑服表示了对PMC建立一所新学校的兴趣，但随后表示他们的目标实际上是星野自己，而与凯撒联手仅仅是因为利益不冲突罢了。黑服表示，作为基沃托斯最高的“神秘”，他将会对她进行实验。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.
desc.jp: Hanging on the experiment platform, Hoshino keeps her head low, resenting her own innocence. She feels sorry to everyone in the Foreclosure Task Force, as well as the former member Yume. Once again, she is deceived by adults.
desc.zh_cn: 星野在实验台上，低着头，怨恨自己的天真。他对不起对策委员会的所有人，也对不起曾经的学生会成员梦前辈。再一次地，她被大人骗了。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること
昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.jp: The director is surprised to hear that the Abydos are really going to pay the debts, but then he questions whether it would be meaningful or pointless. No one could give an answer - when the PMC troops are under a surprise attack.
desc.zh_cn: 理事对阿拜多斯一行人居然真的并非嘴上说说，而是要真的还款一直感到震惊，但随后便反问能否做到以及这究竟有何意义。众人哑口无言，而这时PMC部队突然受到了意外攻击。

desc.en: Problem Solver 68 arrives upon hearing the explosions, acknowledging that the PMC was really out of line. Aru slams the Task Force for "giving up when your friends were in crisis", and repeats the motto that once the Masked Swimsuit Gang told her. In return for the help Abydos had made, Problem Solver 68 join in the battle.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。阿露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。亚瑠抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 便利屋68闻讯赶到，认为PMC做的事情实在过于出格。爱露抨击对策委员会“在朋友遇到危机时居然就此放弃”，并复述了泳装蒙面团那时的座右铭。作为阿拜多斯一行人曾经帮助过他们的回报，便利屋68参与作战。

name.en: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.jp: On That Day, We Met a Girl
name.zh_cn: 那天,我们与少女相遇了

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_cn: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千禧年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.jp: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千禧年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.jp: Aris plays and thoroughly enjoys the Game Development Department's previous title, Tales Saga Chronicle. The club members are touched by her glowing response.
desc.zh_cn: 爱丽丝开心地玩着游戏开发部的前作<传说年代记>。游戏开发部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori discussed the feasibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of modifying her fixed speech pattern.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori discussed the feasibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of modifying her fixed speech pattern.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千禧年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.jp: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。

desc.en: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.
desc.jp: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝一边开始游戏，一边听桃井和绿的讲解。尽管爱丽丝多次失败且遇到了系统卡死问题，但她仍奋起直追，最终通关。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.jp: With the help of Momoi and Midori, Aris was able to reach the True End within 3 hours. When asked about the comments on the game, Aris thought it was fun. Hearing this, Yuzu stepped out of the wardrobe, thanking Aris sincerely.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在桃和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.zh_cn: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_cn: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.jp: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 电脑认出了爱丽丝，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.jp: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.jp: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程师部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程部无力压制狙击手花凛，茜也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates zero failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.jp: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates zero failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.
desc.zh_cn: 众人认为计划的容错率完全为零，因而需要准备后备计划。停电后，爱丽丝检测到时机成熟，逃出了反省室，前往保管所。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.zh_cn: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。
